data.name: Mystic Gate
data.detailed_description:
Mystic Gate" is a roguelike dungeon exploration shooting game.
Control the player character and aim to conquer the dungeon while defeating enemies with guns, dodging attacks with evasive actions, and acquiring new weapons!

Players must clear the progressively more difficult floors one by one. A powerful boss awaits on each floor.
Getting weapons from treasure chests or buying weapons and player skills from merchants will give you an edge in the battle.

The "Gates" and the "Trials.":
One day, a "gate" created by the gods suddenly appeared in the human world.
It is said that any wish will come true if you overcome all the "ordeals" that await you beyond the gate.
Many adventurers have attempted the ordeal, but no one has ever conquered it.

The "hero" and his "sidekick.":
The human protagonist and his robot sidekick are on a journey together for a reason.
They hear a rumor of a gate in a village they stop at, and challenge themselves to a test to make a wish come true.

Unique Weapons:
The game features a variety of unique weapons.
Understand their characteristics, master their use, and kick the obstacles out of your way!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible video card with Pixel Shader 3.0 and Vertex Shader 3.0 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound
